help-file.title: "TOGGLE_NCHAT"
help-file.content:
Syntax: toggle nchat
Setting this option ON will allow you to hear and converse on the "Newbie" chat channel. This is a useful feature for those first starting out on Duris or those that are new to mudding in general.
NOTE: After achieving a specified number of levels, "Nchat" will no longer be available to you. NOTE: If you are a higher level player with an interest in helping new players to the game by providing useful information and answering questions on nchat, please contact a god and have this channel activated for you.
